mapper.select: SELECT C.CT_NO, C.CT_NM, E.EMP_NM, NVL(P.POINT, 0) AS POINT, C.CT_NUM, C.CT_PH, C.CT_SEX, TO_CHAR(C.CT_BIR,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIR, TO_CHAR(C.CT_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS REG, CT_ADD, CT_MEMO,C.CT_EMAIL FROM CUSTOMER C INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT O.CT_NO, O.POINT FROM(SELECT CT_NO, SUM(PT_SAVE)-SUM(PT_DD) AS POINT FROM POINT GROUP BY CT_NO) O ) P ON C.CT_NO = P.CT_NO AND C.DEL_YN = 1
